contributionsList.building:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the 'Building' contributions category tab
**UI Location**: User profile → Contributions tab bar
**When Users See This**: When viewing a user's contributions list
**Technical Context**: Derived from `category.title` (Building); must remain unchanged
**Current English**: "Building"
